languages.text: {n}Собравшиеся радостным хором прославляют ваше имя. В их взглядах вы читаете надежду с толикой недоверия — жители станции не привыкли к подобному милосердию. Однако что-то в вашем голосе внушает им надежду, что это не напускное великодушие, а, быть может, начало новой, менее мрачной вехи в истории станции.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Собравшиеся радостным хором прославляют ваше имя. В их взглядах вы читаете надежду с толикой недоверия — жители станции не привыкли к подобному милосердию. Однако что-то в вашем голосе внушает им надежду, что это не напускное великодушие, а, быть может, начало новой, менее мрачной вехи в истории станции.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The entire gathering glorifies your name with a joyful chant. In their eyes, you see hope with a dash of mistrust. The station's inhabitants are not used to such magnanimity. However, something in your voice gives them hope that you are not putting on a show, and that perhaps this is the beginning of a new and less grim period in the station's history.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Собравшиеся радостным хором прославляют ваше имя. В их взглядах вы читаете надежду с толикой недоверия — жители станции не привыкли к подобному милосердию. languages.text: {n}所有人都欢呼起来，高声颂扬您的名字。在他们的目光中，你看到了希望与一丝怀疑。落脚港的居民并不习惯于这样的慈悲与宽宏，然而，你的声音给了他们希望，让他们明白你并不是在作秀。或许，落脚港的新时代，某个没那么灰暗的全新时代，马上就要到来了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The entire gathering glorifies your name with a joyful chant. In their eyes, you see hope with a dash of mistrust. The station's inhabitants are not used to such magnanimity. However, something in your voice gives them hope that you are not putting on a show, and that perhaps this is the beginning of a new and less grim period in the station's history.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所有人都欢呼起来，高声颂扬您的名字。在他们的目光中，你看到了希望与一丝怀疑。落脚港的居民并不习惯于这样的慈悲与宽宏，然而，你的声音给了他们希望，让他们明白你并不是在作秀。或许，落脚港的新时代，某个没那么灰暗的全新时代，马上就要到来了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}その場にいる全員が、喜びもあらわにあなたの名前を口にする。彼らの目には小さな不信感を含んだ希望が映っている。ステーションの住民はこのような寛大さに慣れていない。しかし、あなたの声には見せかけのものではなく希望を与える何かがあった。以前よりも明るい新たなステーションの歴史が幕を開けようとしているのかもしれないと信じているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The entire gathering glorifies your name with a joyful chant. In their eyes, you see hope with a dash of mistrust. The station's inhabitants are not used to such magnanimity. However, something in your voice gives them hope that you are not putting on a show, and that perhaps this is the beginning of a new and less grim period in the station's history.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その場にいる全員が、喜びもあらわにあなたの名前を口にする。彼らの目には小さな不信感を含んだ希望が映っている。ステーションの住民はこのような寛大さに慣れていない。しかし、あなたの声には見せかけのものではなく希望を与える何かがあった。以前よりも明るい新たなステーションの歴史が幕を開けようとしているのかもしれないと信じているのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Toda la asamblea alaba tu nombre con un canto alegre. En sus ojos ves esperanza con una pizca de desconfianza. Los habitantes de la estación no están acostumbrados a tanta grandeza. Sin embargo, algo en tu voz les da la esperanza de que no estás montando un espectáculo y, que tal vez, este sea el comienzo de un nuevo y menos sombrío período en la historia de la estación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The entire gathering glorifies your name with a joyful chant. In their eyes, you see hope with a dash of mistrust. The station's inhabitants are not used to such magnanimity. However, something in your voice gives them hope that you are not putting on a show, and that perhaps this is the beginning of a new and less grim period in the station's history.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Toda la asamblea alaba tu nombre con un canto alegre. En sus ojos ves esperanza con una pizca de desconfianza. Los habitantes de la estación no están acostumbrados a tanta grandeza. Sin embargo, algo en tu voz les da la esperanza de que no estás montando un espectáculo y, que tal vez, este sea el comienzo de un nuevo y menos sombrío período en la historia de la estación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die gesamte Versammlung verherrlicht deinen Namen mit freudigen Rufen. In ihren Augen siehst du Hoffnung mit einer kleinen Prise Misstrauen. Die Bewohner der Station sind solchen Großmut nicht gewohnt. Irgendetwas in deiner Stimme gibt ihnen jedoch Hoffnung, dass du kein Theater spielst, und dass das vielleicht wirklich der Beginn einer neuen und weniger düsteren Ära in der Geschichte der Station ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The entire gathering glorifies your name with a joyful chant. In their eyes, you see hope with a dash of mistrust. The station's inhabitants are not used to such magnanimity. However, something in your voice gives them hope that you are not putting on a show, and that perhaps this is the beginning of a new and less grim period in the station's history.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die gesamte Versammlung verherrlicht deinen Namen mit freudigen Rufen. In ihren Augen siehst du Hoffnung mit einer kleinen Prise Misstrauen. Die Bewohner der Station sind solchen Großmut nicht gewohnt. Irgendetwas in deiner Stimme gibt ihnen jedoch Hoffnung, dass du kein Theater spielst, und dass das vielleicht wirklich der Beginn einer neuen und weniger düsteren Ära in der Geschichte der Station ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Toute l'assemblée entonne un chant joyeux glorifiant votre nom. Dans leurs yeux, vous lisez un espoir obscurci d'une pointe de méfiance. Les habitants de cette station n'ont pas l'habitude qu'on leur témoigne. Cependant, quelque chose dans votre voix leur fait espérer que vous êtes sincère et que c'est une nouvelle page, moins sombre, qui se tourne dans l'histoire de Castel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The entire gathering glorifies your name with a joyful chant. In their eyes, you see hope with a dash of mistrust. The station's inhabitants are not used to such magnanimity. However, something in your voice gives them hope that you are not putting on a show, and that perhaps this is the beginning of a new and less grim period in the station's history.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Toute l'assemblée entonne un chant joyeux glorifiant votre nom. Dans leurs yeux, vous lisez un espoir obscurci d'une pointe de méfiance. Les habitants de cette station n'ont pas l'habitude qu'on leur témoigne. Cependant, quelque chose dans votre voix leur fait espérer que vous êtes sincère et que c'est une nouvelle page, moins sombre, qui se tourne dans l'histoire de Castel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tüm kalabalık, büyük bir coşkuyla ismini haykırıyor. Gözlerinde umut ve bir miktar da olsa güvensizlik var. İstasyonda yaşayanlar, böylesi bir yüce gönüllülüğe alışık değil. Ancak sesindeki bir şeyler, onlara sırf gösteriş amacında olmadığına dair ve belki de bunun istasyonun tarihindeki yeni ve daha kasvetsiz bir çağın başlangıcı olduğuna dair umut aşılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The entire gathering glorifies your name with a joyful chant. In their eyes, you see hope with a dash of mistrust. The station's inhabitants are not used to such magnanimity. However, something in your voice gives them hope that you are not putting on a show, and that perhaps this is the beginning of a new and less grim period in the station's history.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tüm topluluk büyük bir coşkuyla ismini haykırıyor. Gözlerinde umut ve bir miktar da olsa güvensizlik var. İstasyonda yaşayanlar böylesi bir yüce gönüllülüğe alışık değiller. Ancak sesindeki bir şeyler onlara, sırf gösteriş amacında olmadığına dair ve belki de bunun istasyonun tarihindeki yeni ve daha az kasvetli bir çağın başlangıcı olduğuna dair bir umut aşılıyor.{/n}
